content: repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k10 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k9 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k8 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k7 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round switch to dpns as needed *k6 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k5 k2tog repeat from star to end of round k 1 round *k4 k2tog repeat from star to end of round 50 sts every round will now be a decrease round *k3 k2tog repeat from star to end of round *k2 k2tog repeat from star to end of round *k1 k2tog repeat from star to end of round * k2tog repeat from star to end of round *k2tog repeat from star to end of round 5 sts cut yarn leaving a 6 inch tail thread tail through tapestry needle and weave through remaining 5 sts pull tightly to close hole weave in ends block and enjoy
